synopsis.text: Ash and his friends embark on a thrilling journey when they encounter a boy named Yukinari and the time-traveling Pokémon, Celebi. After Yukinari is accidentally transported 40 years into the future while protecting Celebi from a Pokémon thief, he and Ash's group join forces to save Celebi from the clutches of the Masked Vicious, a powerful Team Rocket hunter. Armed with the Dark Ball, which corrupts and enhances the power of any Pokémon it captures, Vicious seeks to rule the world with Celebi at his side. It's up to Ash, Yukinari, and their friends to rescue Celebi, restore it to its original form, and thwart Vicious' evil plans. The fate of the forest and the future hang in the balance in this action-packed Pokémon adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
